channel.title: How can i make a command like ::santa and it turn u into santa
channel.description: (self explanitory) :D[br][size=1]Posted on: April 03, 2007, 08:20:30 PM[/size][hr]any one now?

item.title: How can i make a command like ::santa and it turn u into santa
item.dc:creator: @tythus tythus
item.description:
@tythus wrote:

if (command.startsWith(“Santa”))
{
npcId = 1552
isNpc = true
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
This Should Work…

Read full topic

item.title: How can i make a command like ::santa and it turn u into santa
item.dc:creator: @Elite_Pkz Elite Pkz
item.description:
@Elite_Pkz wrote:

Hoping your server already has the command ::male[br]

To make the “::santaoff” command:

Search for:

else if (command.startsWith("male"))

You should see:

else if (command.startsWith("male")) { playerLook[0] = 0; sendMessage("You're now a man..."); pHead=1; pBeard=10; pTorso=18; pArms=26; pHands=33; pLegs=36; pFeet=42; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } if (command.startsWith("female")) { playerLook[0] =1; sendMessage("You're now a girl..."); pHead=50; pTorso=57; pArms=62; pHands=68; pLegs=72; pFeet=80; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

After that, add:

else if (command.startsWith("santaoff")) { playerLook[0] = 0; sendMessage("You're not santa anymore."); pHead=1; pBeard=10; pTorso=18; pArms=26; pHands=33; pLegs=36; pFeet=42; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

Made 100% by me, not sure if it works though lmao… Didn’t test.

Read full topic
